body:
Day 63 - 1537*
After the last hentai, this one was below shitty.
1/10.
Also, that copypasta is just as bad as the other ones. So stop being a mentally retarded idiot and grow a pair of testicles.

To all innocent souls that have stumbled into this comment section, If you are reading this, you are immune to all current or future curses on this site. Copy and paste this to 5 other manga, so others may be saved as well.
